props.name: dismissOnOutsideClick
props.description: Determines whether the user can click outside the Popover to close it.

props.name: initialOpen
props.description: Determines whether the Popover should be open initially when its Popover.Anchor is mounted.

props.name: placement
props.description: Indicates placement of the Popover. If not specified, the Popover will be placed automatically based on position priority.

props.name: open
props.description: If you plan to manually control the Popover state, use `open` with `onOpenChange` options.

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Event handler that is called when the open state is changed. Use this to manually control `open`.

props.name: children
props.description: `PopoverAnchor` controls where the Popover appears. It can also activate the Popover.

props.name: children
props.description: The UI element that the Popover anchors itself to. If this also activates the Popover, it must be a Button or Icon Button.

props.name: accessibilityLabel
props.description: Used to give context to people using screen readers about the purpose of this Popover.

props.name: children
props.description: Contents of the popover.

props.name: title
props.description: A visible title displayed in bold inside the Popover.

props.name: root
props.description: You can explicitly set the root element for the portal.

props.name: illustration
props.description: A decorative image or illustration that appears above the title in the Popover.

props.name: width
props.description: Sets a fixed width for the Popover. Can be a number for pixels or a string for percentages, like “75%”. Range is 225 to 480 px.

props.name: default
props.description: The default outlet where portals should be rendered.

props.name: modal
props.description: The outlet where Modal portals should be rendered. Leave empty to just use `default`.

props.name: tooltip
props.description: The outlet where Tooltip portals should be rendered. Leave empty to just use `default`.

props.name: popover
props.description: The outlet where Popover portals should be rendered. Leave empty to just use `default`.

props.description: Determines the size of the Tabs

props.description: Used for the main content of the `TabPanel`.

props.name: color
props.description: Applies a text color from the [semantic color palette](/foundations/tokens/).

props.name: align
props.description: Determines horizontal alignment of the text.

props.name: weight
props.description: Determines the font weight of the text.

props.name: italic
props.description: When true, styles the text in italics.

props.name: decoration
props.description: Determines if the text has a horizontal line through the center of it.

props.name: margin
props.description: Applies the same margin to all sides. The options are based on our available [spacing tokens](/foundations/tokens/#space). The scale is in 4px increments — a value of 8 is a 32px margin.

props.name: marginLeft
props.description: Applies margin to the left side. The options are based on our available [spacing tokens](/foundations/tokens/#space). The scale is in 4px increments — a value of 8 is a 32px margin.

props.name: marginRight
props.description: Applies margin to the right side. The options are based on our available [spacing tokens](/foundations/tokens/#space). The scale is in 4px increments — a value of 8 is a 32px margin.

props.name: marginTop
props.description: Applies margin to the top side. The options are based on our available [spacing tokens](/foundations/tokens/#space). The scale is in 4px increments — a value of 8 is a 32px margin.

props.name: marginBottom
props.description: Applies margin to the bottom side. The options are based on our available [spacing tokens](/foundations/tokens/#space). The scale is in 4px increments — a value of 8 is a 32px margin.

props.name: maxLines

props.name: label
props.description: Label for the textarea

props.name: autocomplete
props.description: Used to tell browsers whether to offer autocomplete suggestions.

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Used to describe why this textarea has an error.

props.name: helperMessage
props.description: Adds a helper message above the textarea. Recommended maximum length is 140 characters.

props.name: isOptional
props.description: Adds (Optional) to the label. Cannot be combined with `isRequired`.

props.name: isRequired
props.description: Adds (Required) to the label and marks textarea as required. Cannot be combined with `isOptional`.

props.name: isDisabled
props.description: When true, indicates that the Textarea cannot be focused, changed, or interacted with.

props.name: labelDisplay
props.description: Can be used to visually hide the legend when another element on the page is acting as the visual label for the textarea.

props.name: labelIndicatorForOptional
props.description: Can be used to override the content for the optional indication.

props.name: labelIndicatorForRequired
props.description: Can be used to override the content for the required indication.

props.name: rows
props.description: Used to set the number of lines of text to display.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the textarea element that is used when submitting an HTML form. [Learn more at MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/textarea#htmlattrdefname).

props.name: onChange
props.description: Event handler that is called when the Textarea value changes.

props.name: onFocus
props.description: Event handler that is called when the Textarea receives focus.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Adds placeholder text to the textarea, if needed. Recommended not to use.

props.name: resizable
props.description: Can be used to make the textarea resizable.

props.name: value
props.description: To implement as controlled component, the `value` prop can be used to maintain the textarea's value
